```py
>>> np.can_cast(np.int32, np.int64)
True
>>> np.can_cast(np.float64, complex)
True
>>> np.can_cast(complex, float)
False 
```

```py
>>> np.can_cast('i8', 'f8')
True
>>> np.can_cast('i8', 'f4')
False
>>> np.can_cast('i4', 'S4')
False 
```

```py
>>> np.can_cast(100, 'i1')
True
>>> np.can_cast(150, 'i1')
False
>>> np.can_cast(150, 'u1')
True 
```

```py
>>> np.can_cast(3.5e100, np.float32)
False
>>> np.can_cast(1000.0, np.float32)
True 
```

```py
>>> np.can_cast(np.array(1000.0), np.float32)
True
>>> np.can_cast(np.array([1000.0]), np.float32)
False 
```
